message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to me is $1200000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1200000 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1350000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $1350000. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $1400000. This is a fair price considering its true value to me. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but $1400000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $1375000.

I understand that $1375000 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll sell the product to you for $1390000. This is my final compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still not comfortable with $1390000. I'm willing to go up to $1380000.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $1380000. I'll meet you halfway again and sell it to you for $1395000. This is my last offer. What do you think?
I'm not willing to go above $1380000, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time, but that's my final offer.

I understand that you're firm on your offer, Bob. However, I'm not willing to sell the product at $1380000. I'll meet you halfway one last time and sell it to you for $1385000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I'm not going to play games, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at my maximum price of $1380000. That's it.
